title: URF mode
body: GOod suggestions, get rid of Kayle, ww, veigar, zed, and URf would be fun get rid of the champs that would see as much op in to no reasons towards that kayle should gbe getting n ult 12 secs..

replies.body:
i spanned 5 arurfs.

Only saw one of the named champions once.

so out of 50 potential chances(5v5 times 5 games=50champions) for one of your named champions to get picked it only got picked once.

_**Once.**_

? just get rid of every champion then.

Litterally  every champ is "op"
